mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class org.klotski.graphics.Window
Override of MouseListener.mouseClicked(MouseEvent) function.

Set the background color when a block is clicked.
mouseEntered(MouseEvent) - Method in class org.klotski.graphics.Window
Forced implementation of MouseListener.mouseEntered(MouseEvent) function.
It is useless in this case, so it is void.
mouseExited(MouseEvent) - Method in class org.klotski.graphics.Window
Forced implementation of MouseListener.mouseExited(MouseEvent) function.
It is useless in this case, so it is void.

Override of MouseListener.mousePressed(MouseEvent) function.
Calls the BoardSelectController to select or deSelect a piece when is pressed
mouseReleased(MouseEvent) - Method in class org.klotski.graphics.Window
Override of MouseListener.mouseReleased(MouseEvent) function.
Calls the MoveController to move a piece with drag and drop
move(int) - Method in class org.klotski.controller.MoveController
Function to move a single Block.
It is used for select and move movement with directions.
It is preferable to call this function inline, for example:

It is used for drag and drop movement with MouseEvent.

moveBack(int) - Method in class org.klotski.graphics.Block

moveBlock(int) - Method in class org.klotski.coding.BoardImp
Moves the selected Block with the given direction
MoveController - Class in org.klotski.controller
MoveController is a controller class that is used to Move a single Block piece.
It dialogues with Window, Board, BoardImp
It is useful if it's created to use function inline from Window
MoveController(Window) - Constructor for class org.klotski.controller.MoveController
This constructor saved data from Window and HighScoreUpdater

It is used with drag and drop movement.

moveSelect(int, MouseEvent) - Method in class org.klotski.graphics.Board
